description:
Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now he`s out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 100 Million Man! World`s Greatest Power and Pirate Black Beard!
Ichioku no Otoko! Sekai Saikou Kenryoku to Kaizoku Kurohige
L`homme qui valait 100 millions ! Le plus grand conseil du monde et Barbe Noire le pirate !
L`uomo da cento milioni di danari!
Человек на 100 миллионов. Величайшие силы мира и пират Чёрная Борода
رجل المائة مليون! أعلى سلطة في العالم وقراصنة اللّحية السّوداء
ชายผู้มีค่าหัวร้อยล้าน กับ 3 ขั้วอำนาจโลกและโจรสลัดหนวดดำ
一億の男! 世界最高権力と海賊黒ひげ
